name: Unnamed Jam Rogue-like
description:
You are a dimension traveling wizard caught between two dimensions occupied by demons... using your powers clear out all the demons!

Since you have no ability to attack you'll have to forcibly kill the demons by occupying the same space as them during a dimensional shift.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD, or Arrow keys - Move
  • Spacebar - switch dimensions
  • R - Restart
  • Esc - Quit application

This prototype was done in 8 hours as part of Guelph Game Jam 6. The theme was "Out of Doors", the original idea was door heavy, the execution far less so. Hopefully I can still participate in future jams...

Notes:

  • I used Derek Yu's rogue-like spritesheet (http://makegames.tumblr.com/post/41267990744/befor...
  • I used Will R. Miller's type-safe event system: (http://www.willrmiller.com/?p=87)
